en.title: PostgreSQL Data Engineering
en.name: PostgreSQL
en.descriptionV1: Design resilient relational databases that power mission-critical applications with PostgreSQL.
en.descriptionV2: We implement performant schemas, high-availability clusters, and analytics pipelines on top of Postgres.
en.additionalDescription: Our teams combine SQL best practices, extension expertise, and observability to keep your data platform healthy.

features.title: Advanced SQL
features.description: Leverage window functions, CTEs, and JSON capabilities to answer complex business questions.

features.title: Scalability
features.description: Implement sharding, logical replication, and read replicas to support intensive workloads.

features.title: Extension Power
features.description: Adopt PostGIS, TimescaleDB, pgvector, and custom extensions tailored to your domain.

features.title: Operational Excellence
features.description: Monitor performance, tune queries, and automate backups with proven playbooks.

process.title: Data Assessment
process.description: Review current workloads, growth projections, and compliance constraints.

process.title: Schema & Architecture
process.description: Design normalized or hybrid schemas, indexing strategies, and deployment topology.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: Provision infrastructure, migrate data, and implement stored procedures and security roles.

process.title: Optimization
process.description: Profile slow queries, fine-tune configuration, and validate resiliency scenarios.

process.title: Operations & Enablement
process.description: Establish monitoring, disaster recovery, and knowledge transfer for your data team.
